subject: [Radiance-general] Re: Cumulative calculations of irradian
body:
Hi Ivan,

If I understand the question correctly, It's more efficient to render
using a 'sky' file that contains both the cumulative sun (e.g. many
suns) and the cumulative sky [1] contribution since the inter-
reflection calculation will determine the indirect sun component as
well and the direct + indirect sky components.
-John
[1] Cumulative sky could be based on either brightdata format or an
aggregated 'image'.
